title: The Newspaper
brief_description: Describes the work of making up and printing an edition of various newspapers - a Hamburg paper, the second largest in Europe, to the regional newspapers with circulation of less than 10,000. The independence of the press is guaranteed in the Federal Republic, and the German people capitalise on this by reading more newspapers than other Europeans.
